content: विहृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To take away, seize away. {@--2@} To remove, destroy. {@--3@} To let fall, shed (as tears); as in बाष्पं विहरति. {@--4@} To pass (as time). {@--5@} To amuse, or divert oneself. sport, play; विहरति हरिरिह सरसवसंते <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; गंधमादनवनं विहर्तुं गता <ls>V. 4</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 6.</ls> {@--6@} To go in various directions. {@--7@} To live. {@--8@} To change, alternate.
